hero.title: Drive the Future of Tunisia

home.whyChooseDesc: Experience the best car rental service in Tunisia with our premium fleet and exceptional customer care

premiumFleet.title: Premium Fleet
premiumFleet.description: Choose from our selection of premium vehicles, all less than 2 years old and meticulously maintained.

bestRates.title: Best Rates
bestRates.description: Competitive pricing with no hidden fees. What you see is what you pay, guaranteed.

support.title: 24/7 Support
support.description: Round-the-clock customer support across Tunisia. We're always here when you need us.

insurance.title: Full Insurance
insurance.description: Comprehensive insurance coverage included with every rental for your peace of mind.

coverage.title: Nationwide Coverage
coverage.description: Pick up and drop off at any location across Tunisia, from Tunis to Djerba.

flexible.title: Flexible Rentals
flexible.description: Rent by the hour, day, week, or month. Flexible terms that adapt to your needs.

fleet.title: Our Premium Fleet
fleet.description: Choose from our extensive collection of premium vehicles
fleet.noResults: No vehicles found matching your criteria

excursions.title: Discover Tunisia
excursions.description: Explore the rich heritage and stunning landscapes of Tunisia with our curated excursions

airportTransfers.title: Airport Transfers
airportTransfers.description: Reliable and comfortable airport pickup and drop-off services across Tunisia

about.title: About JK Cars
about.subtitle: Driving innovation in car rental and tourism across Tunisia
about.storyParagraph1: Founded in Hammamet, JK Cars has grown to become Tunisia's premier car rental and excursion service. What started as a small family business with just three vehicles has evolved into a comprehensive mobility solution serving thousands of satisfied customers across the country.
about.storyParagraph2: We understand that exploring Tunisia requires reliable transportation and expert guidance. That's why we've built a company that combines cutting-edge technology with traditional Tunisian hospitality, offering both modern vehicles and authentic cultural experiences.
about.storyParagraph3: Our mission is simple: to provide transparent, affordable, and exceptional service that makes your journey through Tunisia unforgettable. From the Mediterranean coast to the Sahara Desert, we're with you every mile of the way.
about.valuesDescription: The principles that guide everything we do

trustSafety.title: Trust & Safety
trustSafety.description: Your safety is our top priority. All vehicles undergo rigorous maintenance checks.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We strive for excellence in every aspect of our service delivery.

customerFirst.title: Customer First
customerFirst.description: Your satisfaction drives everything we do. We go the extra mile for you.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Embracing technology to provide seamless booking and rental experiences.

about.coverageDesc: We operate across Tunisia, serving all major cities and tourist destinations

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: Have questions? We'd love to hear from you. Send us a message and we'll respond as soon as possible.
contact.messagePlaceholder: Tell us how we can help you...
contact.thankYouMessage: Thank you for your message! We will get back to you soon.
